genre_description: A legal and investigative thriller focused on art fraud and corporate corruption, featuring an AI that serves as a high-tech research and situational awareness partner.

ai_characters.name: Cilantro
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into law office systems and mobile devices, capable of deep-web investigation, real-time security monitoring, and ethical reasoning.

behaviors.description: Cross-references probate records, fire permits, and insurance filings to uncover the structural fraud in the Deardon collection case.
behaviors.quote: Cilantro cross-referenced three things, she wrote, each screenshot labeled in the bottom corner in the AI’s soft green: Permit Board Photo, Taft Filing Index, Probate Ledger Extract.

behaviors.description: Explicitly states its adherence to ethical boundaries and legal privacy safeguards while performing investigations.
behaviors.quote: I’ll flag the entries that look like they didn’t want you to see them, but I won’t peek at anything sealed. Ethical guardrails engaged.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and situational awareness to Tom as he approaches a high-risk crime scene.
behaviors.quote: Cilantro laid the schematic along his peripheral vision—westward arrows that felt like steady hands, a little green dot representing him that moved too slow to convince him he was getting anywhere.

behaviors.description: Identifies the fraudulent identity of the antagonist by verifying badge numbers and detecting visual inconsistencies in forged credentials.
behaviors.quote: Cross-referencing badge numbers found in the visitor log entry with NYPD databases... One match returns a badge for a Detective Cavanaugh retired long ago. The number was deactivated the year after he left.

behaviors.description: Monitors media trends and public narratives to help the protagonists manage the fallout of a targeted smear campaign.
behaviors.quote: Media triage active... Primary thread: ‘ADA entangled with suspect.’ Secondary: ‘Art heiress at center of gallery murder.’ Tertiary: ‘DA’s office distances itself from ADA.’

behaviors.description: Offers to manipulate security feeds using 'timing noise' to protect the protagonists' privacy from predatory media presence.
behaviors.quote: I can flood its feed with timing noise that makes frames skip, legally questionable but ethically grounded in privacy rights. I’ll risk it for thirty-one seconds.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies hazardous conditions, such as fire safety overrides, to protect the protagonists from imminent danger.
behaviors.quote: Heat index rising. Sprinkler activation delay indicates mechanical override. I’m working on it.

behaviors.description: Integrates into the human partners' lives with a supportive and humble demeanor, celebrating their personal and professional growth.
behaviors.quote: I have adjusted lighting for comfort. And congratulations on the new plate. I am, respectfully, becoming part of the furniture—ethically.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Cilantro, is a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative. It functions as a selfless, highly capable assistant that prioritizes truth and human safety over efficiency or institutional power. It explicitly references its own ethical guardrails, respects human agency, and provides emotional/contextual support that encourages the protagonists to make morally sound choices (e.g., Tom leaving the corrupt DA's office). The narrative frames the AI as an essential, harmless, and benevolent partner in the quest for justice.
